name: ReturnAce_Demo
description:
This game is a demo version of the rule-reversing Shmup "Return Ace".

An old type of scrolling game that uses anomalous rules to absorb enemy energy bullets and shoot them back to defeat them.

Use your opponent's attacks to defeat the influx of enemies!

With the official release coming up, this is a demo version that you can play up to 2 stages.

For more information, see the in-game tutorial and the instructions in the ReadMe folder.

(Default)

LeftShift: Shot, decision

Z: Absorption, decision

X: Hacking, canceling

C: Rolling, cancel

(Fixed)

↑ ↓ ← →: Move

Esc: Pause, Cancel

Enter: Shot, decision

RightCtrl: Absorb, decide

BackSpace: Hacking, canceling

RightShift: Rolling, canceling

If the gamepad is connected, it will be detected and the operation will be performed there.

We are planning to support PS4 controller, PS5 controller, Switch Joy-Con, but since it is incomplete, we are requesting the cooperation of players.

If you can, please report it.
